name: Katlyn G
text: Very polite and voluntarily went out of their way to make the experience better. Also, the food was great!

name: Aleshia White
text: The food tasted okay, but could have been better. The toppings on one of our pizzas seemed to be piled on in some places and lacking in others, which you can easily see with the green peppers in my photo. The icing wasn't evenly spread on ‚Ä¶More

name: Kyra Romero
text: I'm pizza obsessed and I order from this place every time. The pizza is ALWAYS bomb. Love it

name: Jay Lee
text: Requesting a tip before delivery. Then told 30-35 min. Really. A tip is a complement not a guarentee. Sadly pizza hut of aberdeen SD I will NEVER order from you again.

name: Robert Tanner
text: I love Pizza Hut, and would consider myself somewhat of a connoisseur. Everything about my trip to this one was great, except for the sorry excuse for a boneless wing I was given. Their wings are already small, but one of them in this order ‚Ä¶More

name: Amanda Marengo
text: Half of our order was wrong when it was delivered. We ordered a chicken pizza with buffalo sauce and it had zero sauce on it, the manager said ‚Äúshe made it herself‚Äù and argued with us. We ordered mild buffalo wings and got barbecue. By that point we weren‚Äôt going to call back, we just won‚Äôt order from here again.

name: lucena17
text: At first I avoided this pizza hut because of the reviews but I had a 50% coupon so I gave it a shot. The reviews are all accurate. Since a lot of them said they are never ready on time I waited until the last minute to go pick it up. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Daniel Morton Jr.
text: Great, friendly service even later at night!!!üëç

name: Lisa Taylor
text: We ordered  online at 530 this afternoon,  we have made 5 calls, and the last guy was rude, he said ma'am  the store made a mistake, they will deliver the order for free, so I say when, he says the store will be in touch with you. It is now 10:44 pm and no order delivered! This is unacceptable!!

name: linda assman
text: Absolutely the worst pizza I have ever had! Expensive too! I will not be ordering from this Pizza Hut again!

name: Jasmyn Mattke

text:
Pizza fine
wings good
mozzarella sticks where very soft an didn't taste good at all

text: Every time I order from pizza hut it takes at least an hour for them to deliver. I have even done carry out and had to sit in the store for at least 45 minutes before my food was done. And the quality of the food is never up to par. Today I ‚Ä¶More

name: Lisa Roberts
text:
Just recently moved to town and have ordered from here twice now.
I have lived all over the country and this was some of the worst pizza I have ever had. ‚Ä¶More

text: Pizza hut in Aberdeen s.d is horrible they were horrible before they moved and still horrible.  It's sad when the only pizza hut that is amazing is 50 miles away in Webster s.d . You would think they would do a clean sweep of all who work ‚Ä¶More

name: Tana Westby
text: Told we could pick up in 30 minutes. Went in and was told it would be a bit late, it's now been 1:45 minutes since I ordered and still dont have my pizza

name: Nancy McQuillen
text: Very friendly and ordered just what I wanted.üòÄ Also they had the Pizza ready right on time when I picked it up. Nice and HOT!!!

name: Matthew Stahl
text: Great pizza I do wish it was more then just a carry out Pizza Hut.

name: Bob Kovach
text: First note is this is not a dine in resteraunt. Pizza was ok.  It was made quick.

name: Jason Shepherd
text: Hands down Bwst Pizza Hut think crust pizza I've ever had! Perfectly cooked and made! Nice work!

name: carlie stierwalt
text: I ordered my food online I have been waiting for my food over 3 hours now Haven't got my food very bad service never will order pizza hut again

name: Stephanie Meyers
text: Better check your order when you carry out!we didn't get what we ordered online and I forgot to check before we left.

name: April Anderson
text: They were out of everything we wanted. So we had to settle for something....not happy. We didn't get a discount for being inconvenienced either.  The manager never came out to formally apologize for the limited menu.

name: Brenda Hall
text: The buffet was great!  The pasta was excellent and the baked dessert was delicious.  The pizza also was great.  We arrived about 1:10 pm and they were gracious to leave plenty of food out till after 130pm.

name: briannaholtey 3291
text: There pizza is the best! Their food is always hot and ready to go!

name: Trevor Murray
text: Their pizza variety is great and they have amazing white cheese sauce. Their restaurant is always clean and prepared for customers. They have an all you can eat $6.29 lunch buffet, monday through friday.

name: Seth Duncan
text: If you like waiting an hour and a half for luke warm pizza then look no further! Ordered from here twice in the last month and both times took well over an arrive to arrive and by the time we got it it was cold or barely warm. First time thought it was a fluke so tried again and it was actually worse the second time

name: Brian Holler
text: Poor service, made an order and after waiting over 3 hours never received a call, staff claimed to have called several times and my phone never rang. I will never purchase anything from this pizza hut ever again.

name: Matt Swearingen
text: Stopped and had Pizza here tonight and I think they must have finally fired every one including managers and replaced the entire team. The service was excellent and so was the food.... Literally this is the first time they did anything but ‚Ä¶More

name: Michelle Lewis-Vandenberg
text: They never have pop. Its always broken they didn't have pineapples they were out of paper towels. It was faster the last time I was in there. The bathroom is okay. No toilet paper When I was there.

name: Bj Clocksene
text: Waited over 1 hour for our order. We were only table eating at the time,  bathroom  was filthy, staff was playing with hair and eating and or chewing gum while working.    Will not be coming  back  here  wish I could not give any stars

name: C Braun
text: Pizza and wings weren't overly good and the staff was arguing while I waited for my food.

name: Paul Leintz
text: VERY friendly staff and a very clean presentation for a carry out pizza place.

name: August Cass
text: Slowest delivery in town and always out of one thing or another.

name: Sheri Strotheide
text: Been here twice in a week and a half. I come for the hot wings, but i would like celery with it... both times I was told, we don't have celery...ok..water with lemon...Sorry we don't  have lemon... ok...how about a salad...guess what??? They did not have  salad!!!...  geeze...ridiculous!.. not doing it again here!!

name: Derek
text: Took a little over an hour for one pizza to get here. I live on the edge of town, so they could've taken the 35 mph roads; total delivery time should've been 25. Pizza was gross and luke warm upon arrival. Never again. Domino's has much better pizza and would've taken half the time this place did.

name: Audumn Beidler
text: Food was good,  but all but one of  the employees sat on their phones. We had to whistle to get our waitresses attention to fill our drinks. We rarely come here, because the service is always disappointing!

name: April W
text: The last couple times I have gone here the food and service were both terrible. No cheese in a cheesy bites pizza, and the man that served us was a manager that could give two craps less about a customer. I really wish that would get a new owner so I could order pizza hut from Aberdeen again.

name: Kayla Paetow
text: The pizza just wasn't that good ,neither were the breadstick. Tasted kinda old ,honestly.

name: Gary Sauceda
text: Food was good services was ok but i wonder why it is empty all the time

name: Giardia lamblia
text: Ate there 3 times and have yet to get my pizza cooked the way I want it, well done.  As many people are running around behind the counter, you'd think one's job would be to seat people in a timely manner. Maybe not

name: Monica Swearingen
text: Service was great. Manager was very loud when directing staff which made dining-in not a good experience

name: Alfredo Gonzales
text: Pzone's are awesome!

name: Jessica Green
text: I  would do no stars if this let me.  I called to do a special request type of pizza. I advised her that the pizza ranch would make the same pizza. She said...we arent the pizza ranch...yup and you never will be and the rudness i got from her was over the top. It will be the last time i order from them.

name: Real_willflexo
text: REALLY GOOD FOOD!

name: Mitchell Lauseng
text: Terribly ran restaurant. The pizza is good, of course, but going here for the lunch buffet is a gamble at best.

name: Jerry Sauer
text: Price wasn't worth the quality of service and meal

name: Anthony B
text: This place used to be something back when it opened now it is filthy, unorganized, and rude. There are much better pizza options in Aberdeen.

name: Adam Adrian
text: What Pizza hut has no breadstick dough? Seriously!!!

name: Niall Bothwell
text: I travel alot and this buffet looked very appealing compared to alot of other Pizza Huts.

name: Chris Goldade
text: $4.99 lunch buffet is a scam.  Charge tax on the full price and only give you the discount if you buy a $2 drink.  Never again!

name: Carl Randolph
text: Good pizza always freaking hot !!

name: Nicky Gross
text: The food was excellent the service was even better!

name: Alexis Wald
text: Deep dish pizza is my absolute fave and I always get my order in a timely manner. :)

name: kathleen knudson
text: We stopped in at 4:30pm to eat supper. I had the salad bar and my husband had a large pizza. I ordered tea, they were out, the lettuce was not fresh, they had bacon bits which was empty, so I asked if they had anymore, I was told no, not ‚Ä¶More

name: Miguel Garza
text: I had to wait 1 hour and 40 minutes for just a large pizza

name: Tim Waldner
text: Good food.
